TopicTitle: Looking for a mod that improves wheels.

Articles.Content:
Hey guys im looking for a mod to improve wheels.

Rover wheels, Airplane wheels. All the wheels.

More choices, better physics, all that.

I downloaded one that I found. It was ok, but extremely unrealistic.

Small tiny wheels drawing the same amount of power as huge monster truck looking wheels.

Small tank tracks drawing the same amount as HUGE tank tracks.

Most all of these were the same price as well. Only thing that changes with size was mass.

But not enough in my opinion. It was done very nicely in some ways, but just not realistic enough.

Too much of an ARCADE feel.

Does anyone have any suggestions for wheel mods?

PS: one more thing. Lets say I get a mod and I like it but there are a few values here and there that I would like to make changes to.

Is that difficult? Modding a Mod. lol ???

Thanks in advance.

You can change the cost and electrical consumption of wheels in the Parts .cfg, which you can find in ./GameData/Squad/Parts/Wheel

Hope this helped you a little ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif).
When looking for mods, a good place to start is the modding subforums. Moved to Add-on Affairs.
